The paper questions if deep learning's mysteries are unique, suggesting overparametrization and double descent align with existing generalization theories. 🧠💡 #AIResearch #MachineLearning
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.02113
Researchers suggest soft inductive biases drive generalization. 🤖🧠 #AIResearch #Generalization
Scientists show behaviors replicate via simple models like linear regression, using effective dimensionality and Kolmogorov complexity for generalization. 🧠📊 #AIResearch #MachineLearning
The study finds deep learning doesn’t need rethinking generalization 🧠💡 #AIResearch
